description: Describes one or more of your VPN connections. For more information, see Amazon Web Services Site-to-Site VPN in the Amazon Web Services Site-to-Site VPN User Guide.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more filters. customer-gateway-configuration - The configuration information for the customer gateway. customer-gateway-id - The ID of a customer gateway associated with the VPN connection. state - The state of the VPN connection ( pending | available | deleting | deleted). option.static-routes-only - Indicates whether the connection has static routes only. Used for devices that do not support Border Gateway Protocol (BGP). route.destination-cidr-block - The destination CIDR block. This corresponds to the subnet used in a customer data center. bgp-asn - The BGP Autonomous System Number (ASN) associated with a BGP device. tag:<key> - The key/value combination of a tag assigned to the resource. Use the tag key in the filter name and the tag value as the filter value. For example, to find all resources that have a tag with the key Owner and the value TeamA, specify tag:Owner for the filter name and TeamA for the filter value. tag-key - The key of a tag assigned to the resource. Use this filter to find all resources assigned a tag with a specific key, regardless of the tag value. type - The type of VPN connection. Currently the only supported type is ipsec.1. vpn-connection-id - The ID of the VPN connection. vpn-gateway-id - The ID of a virtual private gateway associated with the VPN connection. transit-gateway-id - The ID of a transit gateway associated with the VPN connection. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

parameters.name: VpnConnectionIds
parameters.description: One or more VPN connection IDs. Default: Describes your VPN connections. (string) ---

nested_items.name: VpnConnections
nested_items.description: Information about one or more VPN connections.

nested_items.name: Category
nested_items.description: The category of the VPN connection. A value of VPN indicates an Amazon Web Services VPN connection. A value of VPN-Classic indicates an Amazon Web Services Classic VPN connection.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the transit gateway associated with the VPN connection.

nested_items.name: CoreNetworkArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the core network.

nested_items.name: CoreNetworkAttachmentArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the core network attachment.

nested_items.name: GatewayAssociationState
nested_items.description: The current state of the gateway association.

nested_items.name: EnableAcceleration
nested_items.description: Indicates whether acceleration is enabled for the VPN connection.

nested_items.name: StaticRoutesOnly
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the VPN connection uses static routes only. Static routes must be used for devices that don't support BGP.

nested_items.name: LocalIpv4NetworkCidr
nested_items.description: The IPv4 CIDR on the customer gateway (on-premises) side of the VPN connection.

nested_items.name: RemoteIpv4NetworkCidr
nested_items.description: The IPv4 CIDR on the Amazon Web Services side of the VPN connection.

nested_items.name: LocalIpv6NetworkCidr
nested_items.description: The IPv6 CIDR on the customer gateway (on-premises) side of the VPN connection.

nested_items.name: RemoteIpv6NetworkCidr
nested_items.description: The IPv6 CIDR on the Amazon Web Services side of the VPN connection.

nested_items.name: OutsideIpAddressType
nested_items.description: The type of IPv4 address assigned to the outside interface of the customer gateway.

nested_items.name: TransportTransitGatewayAttachmentId
nested_items.description: The transit gateway attachment ID in use for the VPN tunnel.

nested_items.name: TunnelInsideIpVersion
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the VPN tunnels process IPv4 or IPv6 traffic.

nested_items.name: TunnelOptions
nested_items.description: Indicates the VPN tunnel options.

nested_items.name: OutsideIpAddress
nested_items.description: The external IP address of the VPN tunnel.

nested_items.name: TunnelInsideCidr
nested_items.description: The range of inside IPv4 addresses for the tunnel.

nested_items.name: TunnelInsideIpv6Cidr
nested_items.description: The range of inside IPv6 addresses for the tunnel.

nested_items.name: PreSharedKey
nested_items.description: The pre-shared key (PSK) to establish initial authentication between the virtual private gateway and the customer gateway.

nested_items.name: Phase1LifetimeSeconds
nested_items.description: The lifetime for phase 1 of the IKE negotiation, in seconds.

nested_items.name: Phase2LifetimeSeconds
nested_items.description: The lifetime for phase 2 of the IKE negotiation, in seconds.

nested_items.name: RekeyMarginTimeSeconds
nested_items.description: The margin time, in seconds, before the phase 2 lifetime expires, during which the Amazon Web Services side of the VPN connection performs an IKE rekey.

nested_items.name: RekeyFuzzPercentage
nested_items.description: The percentage of the rekey window determined by RekeyMarginTimeSeconds during which the rekey time is randomly selected.

nested_items.name: ReplayWindowSize
nested_items.description: The number of packets in an IKE replay window.

nested_items.name: DpdTimeoutSeconds
nested_items.description: The number of seconds after which a DPD timeout occurs.

nested_items.name: DpdTimeoutAction
nested_items.description: The action to take after a DPD timeout occurs.

nested_items.name: Phase1EncryptionAlgorithms
nested_items.description: The permitted encryption algorithms for the VPN tunnel for phase 1 IKE negotiations.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for the encryption algorithm.

nested_items.name: Phase2EncryptionAlgorithms
nested_items.description: The permitted encryption algorithms for the VPN tunnel for phase 2 IKE negotiations.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The encryption algorithm.

nested_items.name: Phase1IntegrityAlgorithms
nested_items.description: The permitted integrity algorithms for the VPN tunnel for phase 1 IKE negotiations.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for the integrity algorithm.

nested_items.name: Phase2IntegrityAlgorithms
nested_items.description: The permitted integrity algorithms for the VPN tunnel for phase 2 IKE negotiations.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The integrity algorithm.

nested_items.name: Phase1DHGroupNumbers
nested_items.description: The permitted Diffie-Hellman group numbers for the VPN tunnel for phase 1 IKE negotiations.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The Diffie-Hellmann group number.

nested_items.name: Phase2DHGroupNumbers
nested_items.description: The permitted Diffie-Hellman group numbers for the VPN tunnel for phase 2 IKE negotiations.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The Diffie-Hellmann group number.

nested_items.name: IkeVersions
nested_items.description: The IKE versions that are permitted for the VPN tunnel.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The IKE version.

nested_items.name: StartupAction
nested_items.description: The action to take when the establishing the VPN tunnels for a VPN connection.

nested_items.name: LogOptions
nested_items.description: Options for logging VPN tunnel activity.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLogOptions
nested_items.description: Options for sending VPN tunnel logs to CloudWatch.

nested_items.name: LogEnabled
nested_items.description: Status of VPN tunnel logging feature. Default value is False.

nested_items.name: LogGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch log group to send logs to.

nested_items.name: LogOutputFormat
nested_items.description: Configured log format. Default format is json.

nested_items.name: EnableTunnelLifecycleControl
nested_items.description: Status of tunnel endpoint lifecycle control feature.

nested_items.name: Routes
nested_items.description: The static routes associated with the VPN connection.

nested_items.name: DestinationCidrBlock
nested_items.description: The CIDR block associated with the local subnet of the customer data center.

nested_items.name: Source
nested_items.description: Indicates how the routes were provided.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the static route.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Any tags assigned to the VPN connection.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: VgwTelemetry
nested_items.description: Information about the VPN tunnel.

nested_items.name: AcceptedRouteCount
nested_items.description: The number of accepted routes.

nested_items.name: LastStatusChange
nested_items.description: The date and time of the last change in status. This field is updated when changes in IKE (Phase 1), IPSec (Phase 2), or BGP status are detected.

nested_items.name: OutsideIpAddress
nested_items.description: The Internet-routable IP address of the virtual private gateway's outside interface.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the VPN tunnel.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: If an error occurs, a description of the error.

nested_items.name: CertificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the VPN tunnel endpoint certificate.

nested_items.name: VpnConnectionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPN connection.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the VPN connection.

nested_items.name: CustomerGatewayConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration information for the VPN connection's customer gateway (in the native XML format). This element is always present in the  CreateVpnConnection response; however, it's present in the  DescribeVpnConnections response only if the VPN connection is in the pending or available state.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of VPN connection.

nested_items.name: CustomerGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the customer gateway at your end of the VPN connection.

nested_items.name: VpnGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the virtual private gateway at the Amazon Web Services side of the VPN connection.
